siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Pastimes is a mobile app and community that makes it easy to connect with like-minded outdoor enthusiasts.
blogPost.body: Pastimes is a mobile app and community that makes it easy to connect with like-minded outdoor enthusiasts.
blogPost.title: Pastimes - Find friends who do your favorite activities
blogPost.author: Forest Good

localize.description: Pastimes 是一款移动应用和社区，让你轻松与志同道合的户外爱好者建立联系。
localize.tagline: 寻找做你喜欢的活动的朋友

localize.description: Pastimes 是一款移動應用和社區，讓你輕鬆與志同道合的戶外愛好者建立聯繫。
localize.tagline: 尋找做你喜歡的活動的朋友

previous.excerpt: On Deck is awesome, but it costs both time and money. Browse Fellows from across cohorts, and book a 1:1 with them for free. They'll help you figure out if the program is a fit for you and your lifestyle.
previous.title: HelloFellow - Free chats with On Deck fellows

localize.description: 在甲板上很厉害，但是既要花时间又要花钱。浏览来自各队列的研究员，并与他们免费预约1:1。他们会帮助你找出这个项目是否适合你和你的生活方式。
在甲板上很厲害，但是既要花時間又要花錢。瀏覽來自各隊列的研究員，並與他們免費預約1:1。他們會幫助你找出這個項目是否適合你和你的生活方式。

next.excerpt: Personas used by marketing, UX design and research are often based on assumptions or stereotypes. Akin lets you replace old personas with one survey. Create or upload a survey and segment, find trends and insights without hiring a data scientist or consultant.
next.title: Akin - Replace personas with data driven clusters through surveys

localize.description: 营销、用户体验设计和研究中使用的角色通常是基于假设或刻板印象的。Akin可以让您用一个调查来替换旧的角色。创建或上传调查和细分，找到趋势和洞察力，而无需聘请数据科学家或顾问。
localize.tagline: 通过调查，用数据驱动的群组代替角色

localize.description: 營銷、用戶體驗設計和研究中使用的角色通常是基於假設或刻板印象的。Akin可以讓您用一個調查來替換舊的角色。創建或上傳調查和細分，找到趨勢和洞察力，而無需聘請數據科學家或顧問。
localize.tagline: 通過調查，用數據驅動的羣組代替角色
